DataElement.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Extent Grade
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the extent of chronic graft versus host disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Extent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases.  Onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._The range, magnitude, or distance over which a thing spans an interval of distance, space, or time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A graft versus host disease with symptoms appearing more than 100 days post-transplant.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The range, magnitude, or distance over which a thing spans an interval of distance, space, or time.

Concepts.definition: The range, magnitude, or distance over which a thing spans an interval of distance, space, or time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases.  Onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 8/12/22 added alt VM for Alliance cjl;

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Localized skin involvement and/or liver dysfunction

One or more of the following: generalized skin involvement; or, liver histology showing chronic aggressive hepatitis, bridging necrosis or cirrhosis; or, involvement of eye: Schirmers test with < 5 mm wetting; or involvement of minor salivary glands or oral mucosa demonstrated on labial biopsy; or involvement of any other target organ

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
